footer.companyDesc: Since 1983, we have been offering pioneering solutions in the industrial machinery sector. With our principles of quality and reliability, we provide the best service to our customers.
footer.address: Industrial Zone, 1st Street No: 123 34555 Istanbul / Turkey

hero.title: Industrial Machinery Solutions
hero.subtitle: Serving you with over 40 years of experience

heroSlider.description: Meet Güvenal Machinery, the powerful representative of the industrial revolution in Turkey, and make a difference in production! As Güvenal Machinery, we offer reliable and innovative solutions in the machining industry. With over 40 years of experience, we analyze our customers' needs in depth and develop the most suitable solutions.

corporateSection.title: Güvenal Machinery –
corporateSection.titleHighlight: The Powerful Brand of Güvenal Group
corporateSection.description1: Güvenal Machinery is a brand operating under Güvenal Group, offering pioneering solutions in the machine tools sector. With our experience of more than 40 years and our expert team of 150 people, we provide high quality, innovative technology and efficient solutions to industrial production.
corporateSection.description2: For 22 years, we have been increasing our customers' production power by selling universal machine tools and CNC machines. We provide uninterrupted service to our customers not only during the sales process, but also with 24/7 technical service support and original spare parts supply.

team.title: Expert Team of 150
team.description: Strong production capacity with an expert team of 150 people

experience.title: 22 Years of Experience
experience.description: 22 years of experience in universal machine tools and CNC machines

service.title: Uninterrupted Service
service.description: 24/7 technical service support and spare parts supply

corporateSection.cta: Power up your production with Güvenal Machinery, move forward with confidence!
